item.title: General availability: Azure IoT Central new and updated features—July 2021
item.description: July updates include enhancements to device information displays and new features to help you manage your IoT Edge devices.
item.atom:content: July updates include enhancements to device information displays and new features to help you manage your IoT Edge devices.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning public preview announcements - August 2021
item.description: New features Cross Location Compute, Hierarchical Time Series, and Compute Instance auto-shutdown and auto-start capabilities are now available in preview in Azure Machine Learning.
item.atom:content: New features Cross Location Compute, Hierarchical Time Series, and Compute Instance auto-shutdown and auto-start capabilities are now available in preview in Azure Machine Learning.

item.title: General availability: Azure Sphere OS version 21.08 expected on Aug 25
item.description: Participate in the retail evaluation now to ensure full compatibility. The OS evaluation period provides 14 days for backward compatibility testing.
item.atom:content: Participate in the retail evaluation now to ensure full compatibility. The OS evaluation period provides 14 days for backward compatibility testing.

item.title: General availability: GitHub Codespaces
item.description: GitHub Codespaces is now available to all GitHub Teams and GitHub Enterprise Cloud customers.
item.atom:content: GitHub Codespaces is now available to all GitHub Teams and GitHub Enterprise Cloud customers.

item.title: Automatic Azure VM extension upgrade capabilities now generally available
item.description: Automatic extension upgrade provides safe and automatic upgrades for extensions on Azure Virtual Machines and Virtual Machine Scale Sets, keeping your environments more secure and up to date.
item.atom:content: Automatic extension upgrade provides safe and automatic upgrades for extensions on Azure Virtual Machines and Virtual Machine Scale Sets, keeping your environments more secure and up to date.

item.title: Public preview: Discovery and assessment for ASP.NET web apps with Azure Migrate
item.description: Secure your connection to Azure Migrate services with Azure Migrate Private Link
item.atom:content: Secure your connection to Azure Migrate services with Azure Migrate Private Link

item.title: Public preview: Containerize apps and migrate to AKS and Azure App Service with Azure Migrate
item.description: Azure Migrate: App Containerization helps you containerize and migrate ASP.NET and Java web applications to Azure Kubernetes Service and Azure App Service.
item.atom:content: Azure Migrate: App Containerization helps you containerize and migrate ASP.NET and Java web applications to Azure Kubernetes Service and Azure App Service.

item.title: General availability: Azure VPN Client for macOS
item.description: Azure VPN Client for macOS enables you to utilize features of Azure AD natively, such as multi-factor authentication, conditional access, and user-based policies for you Mac clients.
item.atom:content: Azure VPN Client for macOS enables you to utilize features of Azure AD natively, such as multi-factor authentication, conditional access, and user-based policies for you Mac clients.

item.title: General availability: Introducing global disaster recovery via Azure Site Recovery
item.description: Replicate your virtual machines to any Azure region on the planet to safeguard your applications from disaster.
item.atom:content: Replicate your virtual machines to any Azure region on the planet to safeguard your applications from disaster.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Percept DK July (2107) software update is available
item.description: The Azure Percept July update includes fixes related to security, Wi-Fi/Network, and OOBE UI localization.
item.atom:content: The Azure Percept July update includes fixes related to security, Wi-Fi/Network, and OOBE UI localization.

item.title: General availability: Azure ExpressRoute Global Reach: 2 new locations
item.description: ExpressRoute Global Reach allows you to link ExpressRoute circuits in different locations together to make a private network between your on-premises networks.
item.atom:content: ExpressRoute Global Reach allows you to link ExpressRoute circuits in different locations together to make a private network between your on-premises networks.

item.title: Az module support in Azure Automation is coming soon
item.description: Use the latest Az modules in the Automation runbooks
item.atom:content: Use the latest Az modules in the Automation runbooks

item.title: Availability Zone support for Azure Automation is coming soon
item.description: Achieve higher reliability and resiliency through Availability Zones in Azure Automation.
item.atom:content: Achieve higher reliability and resiliency through Availability Zones in Azure Automation.

item.title: Azure Automation Hybrid Worker Extension for Azure and Arc machines is coming soon
item.description: Onboard Azure automation hybrid workers using hybrid extension for Azure and Arc machines
item.atom:content: Onboard Azure automation hybrid workers using hybrid extension for Azure and Arc machines

item.title: Powershell 7 support in Azure Automation is coming soon
item.description: Execute Automation runbooks for production scenarios using PowerShell 7.1
item.atom:content: Execute Automation runbooks for production scenarios using PowerShell 7.1

item.title: Azure AD support for Azure Automation is coming soon
item.description: Use Azure AD based authentication for Automation public endpoints
item.atom:content: Use Azure AD based authentication for Automation public endpoints

item.title: General availability: Azure Managed HSM Private Link
item.description: You can now use Private Link for Azure Managed HSM to protect sensitive traffic between different Azure and on-premises services.
item.atom:content: You can now use Private Link for Azure Managed HSM to protect sensitive traffic between different Azure and on-premises services.

item.title: General availability: New Australia Central region added to Azure HDInsight
item.description: HDInsight is now generally available for Australia Central customers.
item.atom:content: HDInsight is now generally available for Australia Central customers.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Monitor Scheduled Query Rules API 2021-02-01-preview
item.description: Scheduled Query Rules API version 2021-02-01-preview is now available and is replacing API version 2020-05-01-preview.
item.atom:content: Scheduled Query Rules API version 2021-02-01-preview is now available and is replacing API version 2020-05-01-preview.

item.title: Azure SQL—public preview updates for early August 2021
item.description: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL Managed Instance in early August 2021.
item.atom:content: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL Managed Instance in early August 2021.

item.title: General availability: Lower capacity reservation tier for Azure Monitor dedicated clusters
item.description: Leverage advanced features in Azure Monitor like customer-managed key, Lockbox, infrastructure encryption for lower capacity reservation commitment.
item.atom:content: Leverage advanced features in Azure Monitor like customer-managed key, Lockbox, infrastructure encryption for lower capacity reservation commitment.

item.title: General availability: Azure Monitor IT Service Management Connector is now certified with ServiceNow Quebec version
item.description: The Azure IT Service Management Connector is certified on the Quebec version of ServiceNow, enabling alerts integration with ITSM products.
item.atom:content: The Azure IT Service Management Connector is certified on the Quebec version of ServiceNow, enabling alerts integration with ITSM products.

item.title: Azure Defender for SQL now in general availability on the Azure SQL Virtual Machine blade
item.description: Configure Azure Defender to view and manage your security concerns for SQL Server on Azure virtual machines.
item.atom:content: Configure Azure Defender to view and manage your security concerns for SQL Server on Azure virtual machines.

item.title: Software inventory and agentless dependency analysis generally available with Azure Migrate
item.description: You can inventory installed applications, roles and features and perform dependency analysis on discovered Windows & Linux servers without installing any agents.
item.atom:content: You can inventory installed applications, roles and features and perform dependency analysis on discovered Windows & Linux servers without installing any agents.

item.title: General availability: Azure Red Hat OpenShift support for OpenShift 4.7
item.description: Benefit from new features and enhancements in OpenShift release 4.7.
item.atom:content: Benefit from new features and enhancements in OpenShift release 4.7.

item.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Hyperscale (Citus) support for PostgreSQL versions 13.3 and 12.7 in public preview
item.description: Hyperscale (Citus) now supports the latest PostgreSQL minor versions 13.3 and 12.7 for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open-source Postgres database on Azure.
item.atom:content: Hyperscale (Citus) now supports the latest PostgreSQL minor versions 13.3 and 12.7 for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open-source Postgres database on Azure.

item.title: Private DNS zone integration for Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server in public preview
item.description: Private DNS zone integration is now available for Flexible Server on Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open source Postgres database.
item.atom:content: Private DNS zone integration is now available for Flexible Server on Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open source Postgres database.

item.title: Public preview of Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server now offers reserved instance pricing
item.description: Prepay and commit to one- or three-year’ worth of steady hourly service consumption on Flexible Server for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open source Postgres database.
item.atom:content: Prepay and commit to one- or three-year’ worth of steady hourly service consumption on Flexible Server for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open source Postgres database.

item.title: Public preview of Azure Database – Flexible Server now available in new regions
item.description: The public preview Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server (Preview) is now supported in two additional regions—West US and Germany West Central.
item.atom:content: The public preview Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server (Preview) is now supported in two additional regions—West US and Germany West Central.

item.title: Public preview of Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server now offers reserved instance pricing
item.description: Prepay and commit to Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server for one- or three-years’ worth of steady hourly service consumption at a lower per-hour price point.
item.atom:content: Prepay and commit to Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server for one- or three-years’ worth of steady hourly service consumption at a lower per-hour price point.

item.title: Private DNS integration zone integration for Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server in public preview
item.description: Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server now supports private DNS zone integration in preview.
item.atom:content: Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server now supports private DNS zone integration in preview.

item.title: Azure SQL—general availability updates for early August 2021
item.description: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL Managed Instance in early August 2021.
item.atom:content: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL Managed Instance in early August 2021.

item.title: Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server: Same-zone high availability in public preview
item.description: Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server enables the creation of a high availability server in the same zone as the primary server.
item.atom:content: Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server enables the creation of a high availability server in the same zone as the primary server.

item.title: General availability: Azure Backup now supports Archive Tier for backups of SQL Server in Azure VMs
item.description: Azure Backup now provides the capability to move long term retention(LTR) recovery points to low-cost archive tier for SQL Server for Azure VM.
item.atom:content: Azure Backup now provides the capability to move long term retention(LTR) recovery points to low-cost archive tier for SQL Server for Azure VM.

item.title: Azure Security Center: Public preview updates for July 2021
item.description: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure Security Center in July 2021.
item.atom:content: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure Security Center in July 2021.

item.title: Azure Security Center: General availability updates for July 2021
item.description: New enhancements and updates released for general availability (GA) in Azure Security Center in July 2021.
item.atom:content: New enhancements and updates released for general availability (GA) in Azure Security Center in July 2021.

item.title: General availability: Web Application Firewall (WAF) bot protection on Application Gateway
item.description: Try the bot protection rule set alongside your OWASP core rule set (CRS), now generally available for Azure Web Application Firewall running on Application Gateway.
item.atom:content: Try the bot protection rule set alongside your OWASP core rule set (CRS), now generally available for Azure Web Application Firewall running on Application Gateway.

item.title: General availability: Web Application Firewall (WAF) geomatch custom rules on Application Gateway
item.description: Try geomatch custom rules to block or allow traffic based on geo-location, now generally available for Azure Web Application Firewall on Application Gateway.
item.atom:content: Try geomatch custom rules to block or allow traffic based on geo-location, now generally available for Azure Web Application Firewall on Application Gateway.

item.title: Start VM on connect capability in Azure Virtual Desktop enters general availability
item.description: Start VM on Connect will help you optimize the costs of your deployment by offering a configuration setting in the service to start stopped or deallocated VMs when needed.
item.atom:content: Start VM on Connect will help you optimize the costs of your deployment by offering a configuration setting in the service to start stopped or deallocated VMs when needed.

item.title: Immutable storage with versioning for Blob Storage is now in public preview
item.description: Set time-based policies or legal holds on data so that the data becomes non-erasable and non-modifiable and protect all versions of a blob.
item.atom:content: Set time-based policies or legal holds on data so that the data becomes non-erasable and non-modifiable and protect all versions of a blob.

item.title: Azure Sphere SDK version 21.07 Update 1 is now available
item.description: This SDK update fixes a bug in the 21.07 SDK that was released earlier this month.
item.atom:content: This SDK update fixes a bug in the 21.07 SDK that was released earlier this month.

item.title: VMware Site Recovery Manager is now generally available for Azure VMware Solution
item.description: Azure VMware Solution (AVS) customers are now be able to take advantage of VMware Site Recovery Manager (SRM) for disaster recovery scenarios including; On-premise VMware to AVS, and Primary AVS to Secondary AVS private cloud environments.
item.atom:content: Azure VMware Solution (AVS) customers are now be able to take advantage of VMware Site Recovery Manager (SRM) for disaster recovery scenarios including; On-premise VMware to AVS, and Primary AVS to Secondary AVS private cloud environments.

item.title: General availability: Azure ExpressRoute: 3 New Peering Locations Available
item.description: ExpressRoute lets you extend your on-premises networks into the Microsoft cloud over a private connection with the help of a connectivity provider. The service is now available in 3 new peering locations.
item.atom:content: ExpressRoute lets you extend your on-premises networks into the Microsoft cloud over a private connection with the help of a connectivity provider. The service is now available in 3 new peering locations.

item.title: Azure Site Recovery update rollup 56 is now generally available - July 2021
item.description: The latest Azure Site Recovery update provides improvements, fixes, updated replication support, and download links for Site Recovery components.
item.atom:content: The latest Azure Site Recovery update provides improvements, fixes, updated replication support, and download links for Site Recovery components.

item.title: General Availability: Azure Stream Analytics Tools for Visual Studio Code
item.description: Azure Stream Analytics Tools for Visual Studio Code is for developers to easily author, test, debug, and manage Azure Stream Analytics jobs.
item.atom:content: Azure Stream Analytics Tools for Visual Studio Code is for developers to easily author, test, debug, and manage Azure Stream Analytics jobs.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Virtual Desktop is now available in the Azure China cloud
item.description: Get started today with Azure Virtual Desktop in public preview in Azure China cloud. Deploy and scale Windows desktops and apps on Azure in minutes.
item.atom:content: Get started today with Azure Virtual Desktop in public preview in Azure China cloud. Deploy and scale Windows desktops and apps on Azure in minutes.

item.title: Azure Active Directory support for Azure Relay now in public preview
item.description: Azure Relay now supports authentication and authorization via Azure AD as a public preview offering. With Azure AD, you don't need to store tokens in your code.
item.atom:content: Azure Relay now supports authentication and authorization via Azure AD as a public preview offering. With Azure AD, you don't need to store tokens in your code.

item.title: General availability: Azure Sphere version 21.07
item.description: The 21.07 update includes heap memory allocation tracking, time sync changes, and support for service principles.
item.atom:content: The 21.07 update includes heap memory allocation tracking, time sync changes, and support for service principles.

item.title: General availability: New West US 3 region added to Azure HDInsight
item.description: HDInsight is now generally available for West US 3 customers.
item.atom:content: HDInsight is now generally available for West US 3 customers.

item.title: General availability: Azure Monitor Agent and Data Collection Rules now support direct proxies and Log Analytics gateway
item.description: If you use a proxy server or Log Analytics gateway to communicate to Azure Monitor, you can now start using the new Azure Monitor Agent (AMA) and Data Collection Rules (DCR) in these network configurations.
item.atom:content: If you use a proxy server or Log Analytics gateway to communicate to Azure Monitor, you can now start using the new Azure Monitor Agent (AMA) and Data Collection Rules (DCR) in these network configurations.

item.title: General availability: Better integration between Azure Monitor and Grafana
item.description: Customers using Grafana for visualizing Azure Monitor metrics can now enable additional data sources and have easier authentication using managed identity.
item.atom:content: Customers using Grafana for visualizing Azure Monitor metrics can now enable additional data sources and have easier authentication using managed identity.

item.title: General availability: Public IP information and inter-zone traffic among many new insights in Traffic Analytics
item.description: Azure Network Watcher Traffic Analytics solutions is used to monitor network traffic. It now provides WHOIS and Geographic data for all Public IPs interacting with your deployments and further adds DNS domain, threat type & threat description for Malicious IPs. Now, it also supports inter-zone traffic and VMSS level traffic insights.
item.atom:content: Azure Network Watcher Traffic Analytics solutions is used to monitor network traffic. It now provides WHOIS and Geographic data for all Public IPs interacting with your deployments and further adds DNS domain, threat type & threat description for Malicious IPs. Now, it also supports inter-zone traffic and VMSS level traffic insights.

item.title: General availability: Python Functions now support custom telemetry in Application Insights
item.description: Azure Monitor is releasing a new PyPI package that expands distributed tracing support in Application Insights for Python Functions.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor is releasing a new PyPI package that expands distributed tracing support in Application Insights for Python Functions.

item.title: General availability: Built-in Azure Policy support for Network Watcher Traffic Analytics
item.description: Traffic Analytics can now be enabled using Built-in Azure Policy, thus improving your deployment experience. Now organizations can enforce org wide standards and manage traffic monitoring at scale using these policies.
item.atom:content: Traffic Analytics can now be enabled using Built-in Azure Policy, thus improving your deployment experience. Now organizations can enforce org wide standards and manage traffic monitoring at scale using these policies.

item.title: Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server Auto-grow storage in public preview
item.description: With auto-grow storage enabled, your storage automatically grows when storage consumed on the Flexible Server is nearing its provisioned limit.
item.atom:content: With auto-grow storage enabled, your storage automatically grows when storage consumed on the Flexible Server is nearing its provisioned limit.

item.title: Public preview: Azure App Service Migration Assistant PowerShell-based experience
item.description: The PowerShell-based experience for the Azure App Service Migration Assistant is now in public preview.
item.atom:content: The PowerShell-based experience for the Azure App Service Migration Assistant is now in public preview.

item.title: The public preview of Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server now supported in new regions
item.description: Provision new Flexible Server deployments in new regions for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open source Postgres database on Azure.
item.atom:content: Provision new Flexible Server deployments in new regions for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open source Postgres database on Azure.

item.title: Azure VMware Solution now generally available in the Canada East region
item.description: Azure VMware Solution has expanded availability to Canada East. With this release Canada East is now the second region within the Canadian sovereign area to become available (joining Canada Central).
item.atom:content: Azure VMware Solution has expanded availability to Canada East. With this release Canada East is now the second region within the Canadian sovereign area to become available (joining Canada Central).

item.title: Public preview: IoT Edge Metrics Collector module 1.0.1 release
item.description: This update provides security and reliability improvements, and support for government and regional clouds.
item.atom:content: This update provides security and reliability improvements, and support for government and regional clouds.

item.title: Announcing the Azure Firewall Premium general availability
item.description: Utilize next-generation firewall capabilities in Azure Firewall Premium
item.atom:content: Utilize next-generation firewall capabilities in Azure Firewall Premium

item.title: Public preview: Scan and view lineage of data stored in Erwin Mart, Google BigQuery and Looker using Azure Purview
item.description: Azure Purview now supports automated scanning from Erwin, BigQuery and Looker soureces to extract schema and lineage between data.
item.atom:content: Azure Purview now supports automated scanning from Erwin, BigQuery and Looker soureces to extract schema and lineage between data.

item.title: Shared disks on Azure Disk Storage are now generally available on all Premium SSD and Standard SSD sizes
item.description: Shared disks can now be leveraged on smaller Premium SSDs from 4GiB to 128 GiB and all Standard SSDs from 4 GiB to 32 TiB. This expands shared disk support to Ultra Disk, Premium SSD, and Standard SSD enabling you to optimize for different price and performance options based on your workload needs.
item.atom:content: Shared disks can now be leveraged on smaller Premium SSDs from 4GiB to 128 GiB and all Standard SSDs from 4 GiB to 32 TiB. This expands shared disk support to Ultra Disk, Premium SSD, and Standard SSD enabling you to optimize for different price and performance options based on your workload needs.

item.title: Public preview: Alerts, Pacemaker cluster (RHEL OS) and data-size for SAP HANA
item.description: SAP on Azure customers can now set threshold-based alerts on SAP application, databases and clusters though Azur portal with few clicks.
item.atom:content: SAP on Azure customers can now set threshold-based alerts on SAP application, databases and clusters though Azur portal with few clicks.

item.title: Private preview: New telemetry for SAP Application (NetWeaver) in Azure portal
item.description: SAP on Azure customers can now view SAP Application telemetry like short dumps, SDF/SMON and STO3 in Azure portal.
item.atom:content: SAP on Azure customers can now view SAP Application telemetry like short dumps, SDF/SMON and STO3 in Azure portal.

item.title: Azure VMware Solution now generally available in the Australia Southeast region
item.description: Azure VMware Solution has expanded availability to Australia Southeast. With this release Australia Southeast is now the second region within the Australian sovereign area to become available (joining Australia East).
item.atom:content: Azure VMware Solution has expanded availability to Australia Southeast. With this release Australia Southeast is now the second region within the Australian sovereign area to become available (joining Australia East).

item.title: Azure Automation support for User Assigned Managed Identities is now in public preview
item.description: Use user-assigned identities for Azure Automation runbook jobs.
item.atom:content: Use user-assigned identities for Azure Automation runbook jobs.

item.title: General availability: Azure IoT Central new and updated features—June 2021
item.description: June updates include dashboard enhancements, the IoT Plug and Play smartphone app including updated quickstarts, rule condition enhancements, a new responsive UI, and a new Learn module.
item.atom:content: June updates include dashboard enhancements, the IoT Plug and Play smartphone app including updated quickstarts, rule condition enhancements, a new responsive UI, and a new Learn module.

item.title: Session and cache provider using Azure Cosmos DB in general availability
item.description: Use Azure Cosmos DB as a session state and cache provider through Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Cosmos extension package for global scaling and low latency.
item.atom:content: Use Azure Cosmos DB as a session state and cache provider through Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Cosmos extension package for global scaling and low latency.

item.title: Limited preview: Migrate your Azure Data Lake Storage from Gen1 to Gen2 using the Azure Portal
item.description: Use this simple experience to migrate your data from Azure Data Lake Storage Gen1 to Gen2 to speed up your time to insights.
item.atom:content: Use this simple experience to migrate your data from Azure Data Lake Storage Gen1 to Gen2 to speed up your time to insights.

item.title: Azure Maps Creator v1 preview will be retired on 6 September 2021
item.description: Transition to Azure Maps Creator v2 by 6 September 2021
item.atom:content: Transition to Azure Maps Creator v2 by 6 September 2021

item.title: Public preview: Azure Service Bus support for large messages
item.description: You can now send and receive message payloads of up to 100MB in Azure Service Bus premium tier namespaces.
item.atom:content: You can now send and receive message payloads of up to 100MB in Azure Service Bus premium tier namespaces.

item.title: General availability: Deliver a secure hybrid workplace with Azure Virtual Desktop and Windows 365
item.description: Learn about our new announcements and product updates for Azure Virtual Desktop at Microsoft Inspire 2021.
item.atom:content: Learn about our new announcements and product updates for Azure Virtual Desktop at Microsoft Inspire 2021.

item.title: General availability: Azure Spring Cloud Pricing Model Change
item.description: Upcoming changes to base units in Azure Spring Cloud Basic and Standard will result in lower costs for many customers.
item.atom:content: Upcoming changes to base units in Azure Spring Cloud Basic and Standard will result in lower costs for many customers.

item.title: Free Extended Security Updates only on Azure for Windows Server 2012 /R2and SQL Server 2012
item.description: Learn how you can take advantage of free Extended Security only Azure for workloads running on Windows Server 2012/R2 and SQL Server 2012 releases.
item.atom:content: Learn how you can take advantage of free Extended Security only Azure for workloads running on Windows Server 2012/R2 and SQL Server 2012 releases.

item.title: Public preview: API Management and Event Grid integration
item.description: Azure API Management has now been updated to publish events to Event Grid.
item.atom:content: Azure API Management has now been updated to publish events to Event Grid.

item.title: Azure SQL enabled by Azure Arc generally available on July 30, 2021
item.description: Bring cloud data management to data workloads on-premises, at the edge, and in multicloud environments.
item.atom:content: Bring cloud data management to data workloads on-premises, at the edge, and in multicloud environments.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Spring Cloud New Relic One integration and additional feature updates
item.description: Azure Spring Cloud now supports New Relic One for performance monitoring (in preview), reduced minimum app instance sizes, automated app deployments with Terraform and Azure Pipelines, and Azure Virtual Network in Azure China.
item.atom:content: Azure Spring Cloud now supports New Relic One for performance monitoring (in preview), reduced minimum app instance sizes, automated app deployments with Terraform and Azure Pipelines, and Azure Virtual Network in Azure China.

item.title: General availability: Application Insights integration with App Services for Java & Node.js apps
item.description: Integration of Azure Monitor application insights with App Services now enables you to monitor your Java & Node.js apps directly from Azure portal, without making any changes to your code, with just a click of a button.
item.atom:content: Integration of Azure Monitor application insights with App Services now enables you to monitor your Java & Node.js apps directly from Azure portal, without making any changes to your code, with just a click of a button.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning public preview announcements July 2021
item.description: New features Custom Containers in Managed Online Endpoints and Job Creation UI are now available in preview in Azure Machine Learning.
item.atom:content: New features Custom Containers in Managed Online Endpoints and Job Creation UI are now available in preview in Azure Machine Learning.

item.title: Confidential computing using Always Encrypted with secure enclaves for Azure SQL Database in general availability
item.description: Always Encrypted with secure enclaves helps prevent malicious admins and malware from exfiltrating sensitive data, while enabling in-place encryption and rich confidential computations, including pattern matching, range comparisons, and sorting.
item.atom:content: Always Encrypted with secure enclaves helps prevent malicious admins and malware from exfiltrating sensitive data, while enabling in-place encryption and rich confidential computations, including pattern matching, range comparisons, and sorting.

item.title: Call recording in public preview for Azure Communication Services
item.description: Call recording for Azure Communication Services helps to simplify and improve the recording process during calls.
item.atom:content: Call recording for Azure Communication Services helps to simplify and improve the recording process during calls.

item.title: Insights and workbooks for Azure Cosmos DB now in general availability
item.description: Now generally available, Azure Monitor insights and Azure Monitor workbooks make it easier to visualize and customize metrics for dynamic monitoring of your Azure Cosmos DB resource.
item.atom:content: Now generally available, Azure Monitor insights and Azure Monitor workbooks make it easier to visualize and customize metrics for dynamic monitoring of your Azure Cosmos DB resource.

item.title: Azure AD authentication for Application Insights
item.description: Azure Monitor application insights now supports Azure Active Directory authentication. helping you ensure that only authenticated telemetry is ingested.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor application insights now supports Azure Active Directory authentication. helping you ensure that only authenticated telemetry is ingested.

item.title: Public preview: New Application Insights standard test for synthetic monitoring
item.description: Azure Monitor Application Insights is introducing a new availability test to handle most of your single request test scenarios.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor Application Insights is introducing a new availability test to handle most of your single request test scenarios.

item.title: Public preview: Create AKS clusters without local user accounts
item.description: You can now disable local user accounts when creating Azure Active Directory integrated Azure Kubernetes Service clusters.
item.atom:content: You can now disable local user accounts when creating Azure Active Directory integrated Azure Kubernetes Service clusters.

item.title: General availability: New Azure Monitor built-in policy for Log Analytics workspace and linked automation account
item.description: A new Azure Monitor built-in policy gives you control to provision central Log Analytics workspaces and linked automation account across your subscriptions consistently.
item.atom:content: A new Azure Monitor built-in policy gives you control to provision central Log Analytics workspaces and linked automation account across your subscriptions consistently.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) smart defaults
item.description: Use scenario-specific cluster configurations to get going quickly and easily, while retaining the ability to customize to meet your unique needs as needed.
item.atom:content: Use scenario-specific cluster configurations to get going quickly and easily, while retaining the ability to customize to meet your unique needs as needed.

item.title: Public preview: Event Grid integration with AKS
item.description: Automate AKS operations by subscribing to events and handling them.
item.atom:content: Automate AKS operations by subscribing to events and handling them.

item.title: Now available: Azure Purview product glossary
item.description: The Azure Purview product glossary provides comprehensive set of product terms and definitions used in Azure Purview features and functionality.
item.atom:content: The Azure Purview product glossary provides comprehensive set of product terms and definitions used in Azure Purview features and functionality.

item.title: Disk pool for Azure VMware Solution now in public preview
item.description: With disk pool, Azure VMware Solution customers can now access Azure Disk Storage for high-performance, durable block storage. Customer can scale their storage independent of compute and handle their growing data needs more cost-effectively.
item.atom:content: With disk pool, Azure VMware Solution customers can now access Azure Disk Storage for high-performance, durable block storage. Customer can scale their storage independent of compute and handle their growing data needs more cost-effectively.

item.title: General availability: Azure API Management updates - July 2021
item.description: Azure API Management service has been updated to provide better support to customers through policy expressions and Power platform.
item.atom:content: Azure API Management service has been updated to provide better support to customers through policy expressions and Power platform.

item.title: General availability: Azure Automation Customer Managed Keys
item.description: Encrypt your Automation account assests using Customer-managed keys.
item.atom:content: Encrypt your Automation account assests using Customer-managed keys.

item.title: Azure Blob storage - Container Soft Delete generally available
item.description: Administrators can set a retention policy and recover data from a deletion of a blob container without contacting support
item.atom:content: Administrators can set a retention policy and recover data from a deletion of a blob container without contacting support

item.title: Azure Bastion Standard SKU public preview
item.description: Azure Bastion Standard SKU offers key capabilities for enterprises, unblocking critical customer scenarios.
item.atom:content: Azure Bastion Standard SKU offers key capabilities for enterprises, unblocking critical customer scenarios.

item.title: General availability: HPC Cache for NVME-based Storage, Storage Target Management, and HIPAA Compliance
item.description: The latest release of HPC Cache adds support for high throughput VMs as well as enhancements to storage target operations.
item.atom:content: The latest release of HPC Cache adds support for high throughput VMs as well as enhancements to storage target operations.

item.title: HPC Cache on E-Series VMs Support of Blob NFS 3.0 now generally available
item.description: Add Azure HPC Cache to support new workloads in Blob NFS 3.0.
item.atom:content: Add Azure HPC Cache to support new workloads in Blob NFS 3.0.

item.title: Azure Sphere version 21.07 Update 1 is now available for evaluation
item.description: Participate in the retail evaluation of 21.07 Update 1 now to ensure full compatibility. The OS evaluation period for 21.07 continues for 14 days for backward compatibility testing.
item.atom:content: Participate in the retail evaluation of 21.07 Update 1 now to ensure full compatibility. The OS evaluation period for 21.07 continues for 14 days for backward compatibility testing.

item.title: General availability: Updates to secrets configuration options in App Service and Azure Functions
item.description: App Service and Azure Functions have been updated to better support management of secrets as part of your secure application development process.
item.atom:content: App Service and Azure Functions have been updated to better support management of secrets as part of your secure application development process.

item.title: App Service Environment v3 now generally available
item.description: App Service Environments v3 is now available with no stamp fee and a simplified deployment experience for isolated workloads.
item.atom:content: App Service Environments v3 is now available with no stamp fee and a simplified deployment experience for isolated workloads.

item.title: Direct routing for Azure Communication Services now available in public preview
item.description: Developers will be able to use or extend their existing telephony infrastructure to the calling capabilities they build with Azure Communication Services.
item.atom:content: Developers will be able to use or extend their existing telephony infrastructure to the calling capabilities they build with Azure Communication Services.

item.title: Public preview of OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set 3.2 for Azure Web Application Firewall
item.description: Try our new rule set and increased limits with OWASP Core Rule Set 3.2, now in public preview for Azure Web Application Firewall.
item.atom:content: Try our new rule set and increased limits with OWASP Core Rule Set 3.2, now in public preview for Azure Web Application Firewall.

item.title: Upgrade to Azure Communication Services Calling JavaScript SDK 1.1.0 by 31 July 2021
item.description: We’ve updated JavaScript SDK 1.1.0 to address browser calling applications compatibility.
item.atom:content: We’ve updated JavaScript SDK 1.1.0 to address browser calling applications compatibility.

item.title: IoT Hub IP address change notification
item.description: IoT Hub will be updating the underlying infrastructure and will go through an internal service update. The update will change the underlying DNS record for IoT Hub, resulting in a change of the IP address.
item.atom:content: IoT Hub will be updating the underlying infrastructure and will go through an internal service update. The update will change the underlying DNS record for IoT Hub, resulting in a change of the IP address.

item.title: Public Preview: Form Recognizer container support
item.description: Announcing the public preview release of Form Recognizer containers. Form Recognizer is now also available in the following docker containers - Layout, Business Card, ID Document, Receipt, Invoice and Custom containers for you to run locally.
item.atom:content: Announcing the public preview release of Form Recognizer containers. Form Recognizer is now also available in the following docker containers - Layout, Business Card, ID Document, Receipt, Invoice and Custom containers for you to run locally.

item.title: Virtual Machine (VM) bursting is now generally available on more VM types
item.description: Virtual Machine (VM) bursting is now available for the following virtual machines: Dsv4, Dasv4, Ddsv4, Esv4, Easv4, Edsv4, Fsv2 and B-series virtual machines. VM bursting enables customers’ workloads to handle unforeseen disk traffic spikes smoothly without the need to overprovision their virtual machine.
item.atom:content: Virtual Machine (VM) bursting is now available for the following virtual machines: Dsv4, Dasv4, Ddsv4, Esv4, Easv4, Edsv4, Fsv2 and B-series virtual machines. VM bursting enables customers’ workloads to handle unforeseen disk traffic spikes smoothly without the need to overprovision their virtual machine.

item.title: Update PowerShell versions 7.0 and 7.1 to protect against a remote code execution vulnerability
item.description: If you manage your Azure resources from PowerShell, update versions 7.0 and 7.1 of PowerShell as soon as possible.
item.atom:content: If you manage your Azure resources from PowerShell, update versions 7.0 and 7.1 of PowerShell as soon as possible.

item.title: General availability: Azure Sphere version 21.07 expected on July 21, 2021
item.description: Participate in the retail evaluation now to ensure full compatibility. The 21.07 OS evaluation period provides 21 days for backward compatibility testing.
item.atom:content: Participate in the retail evaluation now to ensure full compatibility. The 21.07 OS evaluation period provides 21 days for backward compatibility testing.

item.title: General availability: Azure Security Center updates for June 2021
item.description: New enhancements and updates released in Azure Security Center in June 2021.
item.atom:content: New enhancements and updates released in Azure Security Center in June 2021.

item.title: General availability: Skip X.509 certificate proof of possession for IoT Hub and DPS
item.description: To make it easier to get started with X.509 authentication with IoT Hub and Device Provisioning Services (DPS), we're removing the requirement to prove possession of uploaded certificates.
item.atom:content: To make it easier to get started with X.509 authentication with IoT Hub and Device Provisioning Services (DPS), we're removing the requirement to prove possession of uploaded certificates.

item.title: Soft delete for blobs capability for Azure Data Lake Storage is now in limited public preview
item.description: If you have processes or tools to detect accidental deletion of files and directories for your Azure Data Lake Storage accounts, you can now also restore the deleted objects using soft delete for blobs capability. During the retention period that you specify, you can now restore a soft-deleted object to its state at the time it was deleted.
item.atom:content: If you have processes or tools to detect accidental deletion of files and directories for your Azure Data Lake Storage accounts, you can now also restore the deleted objects using soft delete for blobs capability. During the retention period that you specify, you can now restore a soft-deleted object to its state at the time it was deleted.

item.title: Azure Maps Android SDK is now generally available
item.description: Get started with Android map control using vector map libraries, now generally available with Azure Maps Android SDK.
item.atom:content: Get started with Android map control using vector map libraries, now generally available with Azure Maps Android SDK.

item.title: Azure Image Builder Service now generally available
item.description: Use Azure Image Builder to streamline your image building pipeline and integrate your DevOps application life-cycle with the cloud native tools.
item.atom:content: Use Azure Image Builder to streamline your image building pipeline and integrate your DevOps application life-cycle with the cloud native tools.

item.title: VPN NAT now in public preview
item.description: Azure VPN Gateway NAT (Network Address Translation) can be used to connect on-premises networks or branch offices to an Azure virtual network with overlapping IP addresses.
item.atom:content: Azure VPN Gateway NAT (Network Address Translation) can be used to connect on-premises networks or branch offices to an Azure virtual network with overlapping IP addresses.

item.title: Limited Preview: New Azure VMs for confidential workloads
item.description: New DCsv3 and DCdsv3-series Azure Virtual Machines transform the state-of-the-art for confidential workloads
item.atom:content: New DCsv3 and DCdsv3-series Azure Virtual Machines transform the state-of-the-art for confidential workloads

item.title: Public preview: Azure Automanage now supports Arc enabled servers
item.description: Now you can automatically onboard your Arc enabled servers to best practice Azure management services using Azure Automanage, saving time and manual management effort.
item.atom:content: Now you can automatically onboard your Arc enabled servers to best practice Azure management services using Azure Automanage, saving time and manual management effort.

item.title: Expansion of the public preview of on-demand disk bursting for Premium SSD to more regions
item.description: The preview of on-demand disk bursting for Premium SSDs P30 and greater (lager than 512 GiB) is now expanded to all production regions.
item.atom:content: The preview of on-demand disk bursting for Premium SSDs P30 and greater (lager than 512 GiB) is now expanded to all production regions.

item.title: Introducing the Ingestion Client for Azure Speech
item.description: Ingestion Client in conjunction with Azure Speech allows customers to transcribe audio files without any development effort. Whether you have few or millions of file Azure will transcribe those securely and quickly.
item.atom:content: Ingestion Client in conjunction with Azure Speech allows customers to transcribe audio files without any development effort. Whether you have few or millions of file Azure will transcribe those securely and quickly.

item.title: Azure NetApp Files | Regional Capacity Quota
item.description: We're changing the regional capacity quota for Azure NetApp files at no additional cost to you.
item.atom:content: We're changing the regional capacity quota for Azure NetApp files at no additional cost to you.

item.title: General availability: Azure Digital Twins plugin for Azure Data Explorer
item.description: Adding context to IoT data just became easier. Azure Digital Twins and Azure Data Explorer now seamlessly integrate, allowing you to allow you to contextualize time-series IoT data.
item.atom:content: Adding context to IoT data just became easier. Azure Digital Twins and Azure Data Explorer now seamlessly integrate, allowing you to allow you to contextualize time-series IoT data.

item.title: General availability: Turn your phone into an IoT device with the new IoT Plug and Play mobile app
item.description: Use the IoT Plug and Play phone app as an IoT device to get started quickly with IoT Central or IoT Hub.
item.atom:content: Use the IoT Plug and Play phone app as an IoT device to get started quickly with IoT Central or IoT Hub.

item.title: General availability: Azure DevOps updates for June 2021
item.description: With this update, we've added a new set of policies which can be used to restrict the scope and lifespan of your organization’s Azure DevOps personal access tokens.
item.atom:content: With this update, we've added a new set of policies which can be used to restrict the scope and lifespan of your organization’s Azure DevOps personal access tokens.

item.title: General availability: Azure Cognitive Services Text Analytics for Health
item.description: Now generally available, use Text Analytics for Health to detect words and phrases mentioned in unstructured text as entities in the healthcare and biomedical domain.
item.atom:content: Now generally available, use Text Analytics for Health to detect words and phrases mentioned in unstructured text as entities in the healthcare and biomedical domain.

item.title: Azure Container Registry is now available in West US 3
item.description: Azure Container Registry is now generally available in West US 3 region. Azure Container Registry handles private Docker container images as well as related content formats, such as Helm charts, OCI artifacts, and images built to the OCI image format specification.
item.atom:content: Azure Container Registry is now generally available in West US 3 region. Azure Container Registry handles private Docker container images as well as related content formats, such as Helm charts, OCI artifacts, and images built to the OCI image format specification.

item.title: Azure Sphere OS version 21.06 is now generally available
item.description: This quality release of the OS includes bug fixes for apps using SPI Flash.
item.atom:content: This quality release of the OS includes bug fixes for apps using SPI Flash.

item.title: Azure Maps Mobility Services Preview will be retired on 5 October 2021
item.description: Transition to Bing Maps Routes API and/or Moovit Public Transit API’s by 5 October 2021
item.atom:content: Transition to Bing Maps Routes API and/or Moovit Public Transit API’s by 5 October 2021

item.title: Azure Data Lake Storage Gen1: Account creation will be blocked for new customers starting July 5, 2021
item.description: Take advantage of Azure Data Lake Storage Gen 2 for all of your analytic needs after July 5, 2021.
item.atom:content: Take advantage of Azure Data Lake Storage Gen 2 for all of your analytic needs after July 5, 2021.

item.title: Azure Blob storage—NFS 3.0 protocol support generally available
item.description: Azure Blob Storage is the only storage platform that supports NFS 3.0 protocol over object storage natively (no gateway or data copying required), with object storage economics. With multi-protocol support, customers can run their applications on a single storage platform with no application rewrites necessary, therefore eliminating data silos.
item.atom:content: Azure Blob Storage is the only storage platform that supports NFS 3.0 protocol over object storage natively (no gateway or data copying required), with object storage economics. With multi-protocol support, customers can run their applications on a single storage platform with no application rewrites necessary, therefore eliminating data silos.

item.title: General availability: Expansion of credit-based disk bursting to Azure Standard SSDs E30 and smaller
item.description: Credit-based disk bursting, which allows you to handle unexpected disk traffic and batch jobs smoothly without the need to overprovision your disk, is now available on Azure Standard SSDs E30 and smaller.
item.atom:content: Credit-based disk bursting, which allows you to handle unexpected disk traffic and batch jobs smoothly without the need to overprovision your disk, is now available on Azure Standard SSDs E30 and smaller.

item.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Hyperscale (Citus) now offers server group restart feature in public preview
item.description: The restart server group capability is now available in preview for Hyperscale (Citus) on Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the Postgres open-source database on Azure.
item.atom:content: The restart server group capability is now available in preview for Hyperscale (Citus) on Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the Postgres open-source database on Azure.

item.title: Azure SQL—public preview updates for late June 2021
item.description: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in late June 2021.
item.atom:content: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in late June 2021.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning public preview announcements for June 2021
item.description: New features include data scientist built-in role, text classification labeling, and environments UI.
item.atom:content: New features include data scientist built-in role, text classification labeling, and environments UI.

item.title: Azure SQL—general availability updates for late June 2021
item.description: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in late June 2021
item.atom:content: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in late June 2021

item.title: Full text query in diagnostics logs for Azure Cosmos DB in general availability
item.description: Use self-serve to enable/disable full text query to deobfuscate your queries in diagnostic logs with the full-text query for Azure Cosmos DB feature.
item.atom:content: Use self-serve to enable/disable full text query to deobfuscate your queries in diagnostic logs with the full-text query for Azure Cosmos DB feature.

item.title: Azure IoT Edge for Linux now generally available
item.description: Leverage existing Windows expertise and seamlessly connect Azure IoT Edge for Linux on Windows devices to Microsoft Azure and quickly bring cloud intelligence to your edge.
item.atom:content: Leverage existing Windows expertise and seamlessly connect Azure IoT Edge for Linux on Windows devices to Microsoft Azure and quickly bring cloud intelligence to your edge.

item.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server: Forced failover in public preview
item.description: Forced failover capability is available in preview in all zone redundant regions on Flexible Server for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open-source Postgres database on Azure.
item.atom:content: Forced failover capability is available in preview in all zone redundant regions on Flexible Server for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open-source Postgres database on Azure.

item.title: Azure Key Vault Managed HSM is generally available
item.description: Azure Key Vault Managed HSM (hardware security module) is now generally available. Managed HSM offers a fully managed, highly available, single-tenant, high-throughput, standards-compliant cloud service to safeguard cryptographic keys for your cloud applications, using FIPS 140-2 Level 3 validated HSMs.
item.atom:content: Azure Key Vault Managed HSM (hardware security module) is now generally available. Managed HSM offers a fully managed, highly available, single-tenant, high-throughput, standards-compliant cloud service to safeguard cryptographic keys for your cloud applications, using FIPS 140-2 Level 3 validated HSMs.

item.title: Public preview of Default Rule Set 2.0 for Azure Web Application Firewall
item.description: Increase your security posture and reduce false positives with the Default Rule Set 2.0, now in public preview for Azure Web Application Firewall.
item.atom:content: Increase your security posture and reduce false positives with the Default Rule Set 2.0, now in public preview for Azure Web Application Firewall.

item.title: General availability: Azure Data Explorer adds new geospatial capabilities
item.description: The new support for H3 based geospatial clustering in KQL enables users to visualize and explore spatial data stored in Azure Data Explorer.
item.atom:content: The new support for H3 based geospatial clustering in KQL enables users to visualize and explore spatial data stored in Azure Data Explorer.

item.title: Azure Blob index tags now generally available
item.description: Azure Blob index tags now generally available. Blob index tags allows developers and IT Pros to first tag specific blobs (for example, StoreID = "1234") and then filter or query for all blobs to more easily find or use them.
item.atom:content: Azure Blob index tags now generally available. Blob index tags allows developers and IT Pros to first tag specific blobs (for example, StoreID = "1234") and then filter or query for all blobs to more easily find or use them.

item.title: General availability: Cross region Restore of SQL/SAP HANA running in Azure VM
item.description: General availability of Cross Region Restore of SQL/SAP HANA databases running in Azure VM allows to restore data in the secondary region for compliance/audit and outage scenarios.
item.atom:content: General availability of Cross Region Restore of SQL/SAP HANA databases running in Azure VM allows to restore data in the secondary region for compliance/audit and outage scenarios.

item.title: General availability: Maintenance control for Virtual Machine Scale Sets OS image upgrades
item.description: Take control of OS image upgrades on your virtual machine scale sets by using the new maintenance control feature. Now you can update at the time chosen by you with all the safety checks in place.
item.atom:content: Take control of OS image upgrades on your virtual machine scale sets by using the new maintenance control feature. Now you can update at the time chosen by you with all the safety checks in place.

item.title: General availability: Azure Data Explorer and subnet delegation
item.description: Injecting an Azure Data Explorer cluster into a virtual network has never been easier.
item.atom:content: Injecting an Azure Data Explorer cluster into a virtual network has never been easier.

item.title: Azure Data Lake Storage static website is now generally available
item.description: Directly host static content from Azure Data Lake Storage and view that content from a browser by using the public URL of that website.
item.atom:content: Directly host static content from Azure Data Lake Storage and view that content from a browser by using the public URL of that website.

item.title: Public preview: Alerts based smart detection for Application Insights
item.description: Get your anomaly detections as alerts, manage smart detection using alert rules, and configure notifications for smart detection alerts using action groups.
item.atom:content: Get your anomaly detections as alerts, manage smart detection using alert rules, and configure notifications for smart detection alerts using action groups.

item.title: New Azure private MEC solution announced
item.description: Azure private multi-access edge compute (MEC) enables operators and systems integrators to simplify the consumption of secure and private 5G networks, and to easily deliver ultra-low-latency networking, applications, and services at the enterprise edge.
item.atom:content: Azure private multi-access edge compute (MEC) enables operators and systems integrators to simplify the consumption of secure and private 5G networks, and to easily deliver ultra-low-latency networking, applications, and services at the enterprise edge.

item.title: Azure Virtual Machines DCsv2-series are now available in Australia
item.description: Confidential computing DCsv2-series virtual machines (VMs) are now available in Australia
item.atom:content: Confidential computing DCsv2-series virtual machines (VMs) are now available in Australia

item.title: General availability: Azure IoT Central new and updated features—May 2021
item.description: May updates include device template DTDL editing, displaying external content on dashboards, other UI and doc enhancements, and CDE parity with CDE v1.
item.atom:content: May updates include device template DTDL editing, displaying external content on dashboards, other UI and doc enhancements, and CDE parity with CDE v1.

item.title: Microsoft Azure available from new cloud regions in Arizona
item.description: Azure is now available from our newest sustainable datacenter region West US 3 in Arizona.
item.atom:content: Azure is now available from our newest sustainable datacenter region West US 3 in Arizona.

item.title: Azure Monitor Agent and Data Collection Rules now generally available
item.description: Start using or migrating to the new Azure Monitor Agent and Data Collection Rules in your production environments to leverage key new capabilities and save on ingestion costs. With support for private links and direct proxies coming soon, you would be able to use these features without compromising on your networking requirements.
item.atom:content: Start using or migrating to the new Azure Monitor Agent and Data Collection Rules in your production environments to leverage key new capabilities and save on ingestion costs. With support for private links and direct proxies coming soon, you would be able to use these features without compromising on your networking requirements.

item.title: General availability: Support for SQL Server in data flows using Azure Data Factory & Azure Synapse
item.description: SQL Server is now available as a data flow source sink from your on-premises and VM-based instances in ADF and Synapse Analytics.
item.atom:content: SQL Server is now available as a data flow source sink from your on-premises and VM-based instances in ADF and Synapse Analytics.

item.title: Azure Dev Spaces retired on May 15, 2021
item.description: Take advantage of Bridge for Kubernetes for development scenarios that Azure Dev Spaces previously supported.
item.atom:content: Take advantage of Bridge for Kubernetes for development scenarios that Azure Dev Spaces previously supported.

item.title: Call recording for Azure Communication Services coming soon
item.description: Call recording for Azure Communication Services helps to simplify and improve the recording process during calls.
item.atom:content: Call recording for Azure Communication Services helps to simplify and improve the recording process during calls.

item.title: Direct routing for Azure Communication Services coming soon
item.description: Developers will be able to use or extend their existing telephony infrastructure to the calling capabilities they build with Azure Communication Services.
item.atom:content: Developers will be able to use or extend their existing telephony infrastructure to the calling capabilities they build with Azure Communication Services.

item.title: Azure Maps Elevation API is now in general availability
item.description: For any given point on the Earth surface, the Elevation API returns its elevation measured from mean sea level.
item.atom:content: For any given point on the Earth surface, the Elevation API returns its elevation measured from mean sea level.

item.title: Five more free services available with an Azure free account
item.description: We've added the option to use Azure Database for PostgreSQL, Azure Database for MySQL, Azure Key Vault, Azure Logic Apps, and the Encoding feature of Azure Media Services to services included with free accounts.
item.atom:content: We've added the option to use Azure Database for PostgreSQL, Azure Database for MySQL, Azure Key Vault, Azure Logic Apps, and the Encoding feature of Azure Media Services to services included with free accounts.

item.title: Azure IoT Edge integration with Azure Monitor is now in public preview
item.description: Monitoring and troubleshooting your Azure IoT Edge devices just became more simple and efficient.
item.atom:content: Monitoring and troubleshooting your Azure IoT Edge devices just became more simple and efficient.

item.title: General availability: Confidential Computing price reduction on DCsv2 virtual machines
item.description: DCsv2-series Azure Virtual Machines protect the confidentiality and integrity of your data and code while it’s processed in the public cloud. The price for this offering is now 37% lower.
item.atom:content: DCsv2-series Azure Virtual Machines protect the confidentiality and integrity of your data and code while it’s processed in the public cloud. The price for this offering is now 37% lower.

item.title: General availability: Azure Sphere OS version 21.06 expected on June 23
item.description: Participate in the retail evaluation now to ensure full compatibility. The OS evaluation period provides 14 days for backward compatibility testing.
item.atom:content: Participate in the retail evaluation now to ensure full compatibility. The OS evaluation period provides 14 days for backward compatibility testing.

item.title: General availability: 6 new Locales added to Speech service to support speech transcription
item.description: Speech service has added Speech to Text support for 6 new languages and locales.
item.atom:content: Speech service has added Speech to Text support for 6 new languages and locales.

item.title: Azure Defender for Azure Database for MySQL – Single Server now generally available
item.description: Azure Defender detects anomalous activities indicating unusual and potentially harmful attempts to access or exploit your Azure Database for MySQL.
item.atom:content: Azure Defender detects anomalous activities indicating unusual and potentially harmful attempts to access or exploit your Azure Database for MySQL.

item.title: Azure Defender for Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Single Server in general availability
item.description: Azure Defender provides security alerts for anomalous activities so that you can detect potential threats and respond to them as they occur.
item.atom:content: Azure Defender provides security alerts for anomalous activities so that you can detect potential threats and respond to them as they occur.

item.atom:content: Set up alerts today on the Azure portal to be notified about planned deployments for Azure Database for MariaDB.

item.description: Setup alerts on the Azure portal to be notified about planned deployments with planned maintenance notifications for Azure Database for MySQL – Single Server.
item.atom:content: Setup alerts on the Azure portal to be notified about planned deployments with planned maintenance notifications for Azure Database for MySQL – Single Server.

item.atom:content: Select your standby server zone for Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server.

item.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Hyperscale (Citus) now compliant with additional certifications
item.description: New certifications are now available for Hyperscale (Citus) on Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open-source Postgres database on Azure.
item.atom:content: New certifications are now available for Hyperscale (Citus) on Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open-source Postgres database on Azure.

item.title: General availability: Application Insights Node.js pre-aggregated standard metrics
item.description: Azure Monitor Application Insights Node.js SDK adds pre-aggregated standard metrics to enhance accuracy of alerts when telemetry sampling is enabled.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor Application Insights Node.js SDK adds pre-aggregated standard metrics to enhance accuracy of alerts when telemetry sampling is enabled.

item.title: Public preview: Syslog event collection from Azure Monitor Agent for Linux distros
item.description: Upgrade to Azure Monitor Agent for Linux version 1.10 or above to enable syslog data collection using data collection rules for your Linux machines.
item.atom:content: Upgrade to Azure Monitor Agent for Linux version 1.10 or above to enable syslog data collection using data collection rules for your Linux machines.

item.title: General availability: Enterprise-scale landing zone reference implementation for AKS
item.description: Rapidly adopt Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) using industry-proven practices.
item.atom:content: Rapidly adopt Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) using industry-proven practices.

item.title: Azure Cache for Redis zone redundancy for Premium tier now generally available
item.description: Azure Cache for Redis zone redundancy allows you to deploy your Premium tier caches across multiple availability zones, delivering higher availability and resiliency.
item.atom:content: Azure Cache for Redis zone redundancy allows you to deploy your Premium tier caches across multiple availability zones, delivering higher availability and resiliency.

item.title: Azure Migrate private endpoint support available in public preview
item.description: Secure your connection to Azure Migrate services with Azure Migrate Private Link.
item.atom:content: Secure your connection to Azure Migrate services with Azure Migrate Private Link.

item.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server: Support for Postgres 13 (public preview)
item.description: Create new Flexible Servers using PostgreSQL 13 version for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open source Postgres database on Azure.
item.atom:content: Create new Flexible Servers using PostgreSQL 13 version for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, a managed service running the open source Postgres database on Azure.

item.title: Open source API portal now generally availabile
