item.atom:content: You can create and publish a customized site with API documentation, automatically generated from OpenAPI files.

item.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server supports PostgreSQL minor versions (public preview)
item.description: Benefit from the latest PostgreSQL minor versions that include many security updates and bug fixes for Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server, a managed service running the open-source Postgres database.
item.atom:content: Benefit from the latest PostgreSQL minor versions that include many security updates and bug fixes for Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server, a managed service running the open-source Postgres database.

item.title: General availability: Update in Policy Compliance for Resource Type Policies
item.description: Azure Policy built-in policies in which resource type is the only evaluation criterion (e.g. Allowed Resource Types, Disallowed Resource Types) have updated logic to provide a more accurate assessment of your overall environment when aggregated with other policies.
item.atom:content: Azure Policy built-in policies in which resource type is the only evaluation criterion (e.g. Allowed Resource Types, Disallowed Resource Types) have updated logic to provide a more accurate assessment of your overall environment when aggregated with other policies.

item.title: Azure Backup: Upgrade to TLS 1.2 or above for secure MARS agent backups by September 1, 2021
item.description: Support for TLS 1.0 and 1.1 ends September 1, 2021, please upgrade to TLS 1.2 to ensure secure and uninterrupted backups using MARS agent
item.atom:content: Support for TLS 1.0 and 1.1 ends September 1, 2021, please upgrade to TLS 1.2 to ensure secure and uninterrupted backups using MARS agent

item.title: General availability: ExpressRoute Global Reach Pricing Reduction
item.description: ExpressRoute Global Reach allows you to link ExpressRoute circuits together to make a private network between your on-premises networks. The data transfer price for this offering is now 50% lower.
item.atom:content: ExpressRoute Global Reach allows you to link ExpressRoute circuits together to make a private network between your on-premises networks. The data transfer price for this offering is now 50% lower.

item.title: General availability: Key Rotation and Expiration Policies for Azure Storage
item.description: Access Key Expiration and Policy support for Azure Storage Accounts
item.atom:content: Access Key Expiration and Policy support for Azure Storage Accounts

item.title: Azure Maps Creator is now generally available
item.description: Azure Maps Creator provides an end-to-end solution for private indoor maps.
item.atom:content: Azure Maps Creator provides an end-to-end solution for private indoor maps.

item.title: Now Available: Pricing changes to Azure Sentinel and Azure Monitor to help you reduce costs
item.description: Enjoy additional cost savings with the new price changes to Azure Sentinel and Azure monitor. These changes took effect on June 2, 2021.
item.atom:content: Enjoy additional cost savings with the new price changes to Azure Sentinel and Azure monitor. These changes took effect on June 2, 2021.

item.title: Public preview: Identity-based connections in Azure Functions with latest Azure SDK triggers and bindings
item.description: Azure functions can now connect using an identity instead of a secret.
item.atom:content: Azure functions can now connect using an identity instead of a secret.

item.title: Azure Digital Twins Explorer available in public preview
item.description: Visual developer tool for exploring your digital twin is now available as a web application.
item.atom:content: Visual developer tool for exploring your digital twin is now available as a web application.

item.title: General availability: Azure API Management Premium tier price reduction for incremental purchased units
item.description: After the first purchased unit, a price reduction of 50% will be applied on all subsequent units purchased.
item.atom:content: After the first purchased unit, a price reduction of 50% will be applied on all subsequent units purchased.

item.title: Azure Security Center: Public preview updates for May 2021
item.description: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure Security Center in May 2021.
item.atom:content: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure Security Center in May 2021.

item.title: Azure Security Center: General availability updates for May 2021
item.description: New enhancements and updates released for general availability (GA) in Azure Security Center in May 2021.
item.atom:content: New enhancements and updates released for general availability (GA) in Azure Security Center in May 2021.

item.title: Azure Site Recovery update rollup 55 is now generally available - April 2021
item.description: The latest Azure Site Recovery update provides improvements, fixes, updated replication support, and download links for Site Recovery components.
item.atom:content: The latest Azure Site Recovery update provides improvements, fixes, updated replication support, and download links for Site Recovery components.

item.title: Query Delta Lake files using T-SQL in Azure Synapse Analytics (public preview)
item.description: Use T-SQL in Azure Synapse to read Delta Lake format.
item.atom:content: Use T-SQL in Azure Synapse to read Delta Lake format.

item.title: Cognitive Services - Form Recognizer adds new version in general availability
item.description: Support for 73 languages, prebuilt ID model, invoice line item extraction, table header extraction tagging as table, and more generally available in Azure Form Recognizer, part of Applied AI Services.
item.atom:content: Support for 73 languages, prebuilt ID model, invoice line item extraction, table header extraction tagging as table, and more generally available in Azure Form Recognizer, part of Applied AI Services.

item.category: Azure Log Analytics; Azure Monitor; Log Analytics;
item.title: General availability: Azure Log Analytics in South India
item.description: Log Analytics, a feature of Azure Monitor, is now generally available for customers to start collecting telemetry and analyzing their services for health and usage in South India.
item.atom:content: Log Analytics, a feature of Azure Monitor, is now generally available for customers to start collecting telemetry and analyzing their services for health and usage in South India.

item.title: General availability: Application Insight in South India
item.description: Application Insight, a part of Azure Monitor, is now generally available in South India region for customers to collect telemetry and analyze their service health in production environments.
item.atom:content: Application Insight, a part of Azure Monitor, is now generally available in South India region for customers to collect telemetry and analyze their service health in production environments.

item.title: Azure Storage Blob inventory public preview is now available in all public regions
item.description: Blob inventory allows you to get a full listing of all blobs within a storage account or container. This can be used in conjunction with Synapse to calculate per container metrics such as capacity and count.
item.atom:content: Blob inventory allows you to get a full listing of all blobs within a storage account or container. This can be used in conjunction with Synapse to calculate per container metrics such as capacity and count.

item.title: Public preview: Introducing new Durable Functions storage provider options
item.description: Durable Functions, an extension to the Azure Functions runtime, adds two new storage provider options in public preview.
item.atom:content: Durable Functions, an extension to the Azure Functions runtime, adds two new storage provider options in public preview.

item.title: PowerShell support in Durable Functions is now generally available
item.description: PowerShell users can use Durable Functions create serverless workflows to orchestrate complex, long-running automation processes.
item.atom:content: PowerShell users can use Durable Functions create serverless workflows to orchestrate complex, long-running automation processes.

item.title: Azure Security Center integration with GitHub Actions, in public preview
item.description: GitHub’s integration with Azure Security Center is now in public preview—offering new ways for you to integrate security and compliance into early stages of the software development lifecycle.
item.atom:content: GitHub’s integration with Azure Security Center is now in public preview—offering new ways for you to integrate security and compliance into early stages of the software development lifecycle.

item.title: Public preview: Announcing Azure Synapse Link for Dataverse
item.description: Power your business applications data with analytical and predictive insights.
item.atom:content: Power your business applications data with analytical and predictive insights.

item.title: Public preview: Scan and view lineage of data stored in Hive Metastore Database using Azure Purview
item.description: Azure Purview now supports automated scanning from a Hive Metastore Database to extract schema and lineage between data.
item.atom:content: Azure Purview now supports automated scanning from a Hive Metastore Database to extract schema and lineage between data.

item.title: Spot Virtual Machines are now generally available on Azure Databricks
item.description: Access unused Azure compute capacity at discounted rates using Spot VMs on Azure Databricks
item.atom:content: Access unused Azure compute capacity at discounted rates using Spot VMs on Azure Databricks
